tool_description: Determines seismic site class based on soil properties and geotechnical data according to building code requirements.

soil_profile_name.description: Name identifier for the soil profile being analyzed

average_shear_wave_velocity.description: Average shear wave velocity in the top 30m of soil (Vs30) in m/s, range 150-1500

standard_penetration_values.description: N-values from standard penetration tests, if available

undrained_shear_strength.description: Average undrained shear strength in kPa for cohesive soils, range 10-200

error_messages: Invalid shear wave velocity: Vs30 must be between 150-1500 m/s. Check geotechnical report data.
Insufficient soil data: Provide either Vs30, SPT N-values, or undrained shear strength. Obtain additional geotechnical testing if needed.
Inconsistent soil parameters: Verify that provided parameters are consistent with each other and site conditions.
usage: Input soil profile name and primary soil parameter (Vs30 preferred). Additional parameters improve classification accuracy. Tool determines site class per ASCE 7 or equivalent code.

site_class.description: Assigned site class (A, B, C, D, E, or F)

classification_method.description: Method used for classification (Vs30, SPT, or shear strength)

site_coefficients.description: Site modification coefficients Fa and Fv
